name: ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for a selected move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It restores the PP of a Pokémon’s selected move by a maximum of 10 points.
flavor_text.platinum: It restores the PP of a Pokémon’s selected move by a maximum of 10 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It restores the PP of a Pokémon’s selected move by a maximum of 10 points.
